pullrequest.title: handle inertia rotation and use full pose specified in sdf Inertial block

content.raw: To clarify, I think you mean that adding spaces will push the line lengths over 80 characters? I made a fix in 71c4092 by reducing the indentation, so it now passes code check. I committed to this branch, but I'll leave it to John to update the pull request if he sees fit.
content.html: To clarify, I think you mean that adding spaces will push the line lengths over 80 characters? I made a fix in 71c4092 by reducing the indentation, so it now passes code check. I committed to this branch, but I'll leave it to John to update the pull request if he sees fit.
